reviewText: This is nice but for several dollars more you can get the complete season. I will also say that it doesn't really show anything new in what we know of Belichick,
Gets into Bills Life at home and work...
Pure Belichick!  He is a genious and the other NFL teams are just plain PARANOID!!
Must have for Patriots fans.  Great series, too.
An awesome inside look at the genius of Bill Belichick. The guy is the greatest ever.

An incredible view of Bill Belichick's life in and out of football. Who would have thought there would be such a warm likeable man under that surly exterior? I truly couldn't admire him more than I do now that I've seen him in action.
very nice covered all the coaching and good behind the scenes views
Complete and utter domination of the NFL for 15 plus years. Great DVD to see the behind the scenes human side of the hoodie genius!
My husband and I are football fans. We are New England Patriot fans too. This is a great video for someone who loves football. You will enjoy this video.
I am so glad I ordered this item.....it is an awesome DVD and brings back so many wonderful memories!!
